name: Trash Mob (Calangames)
description:
Controls
  • W A S D - Movement
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • Left Mouse Button - Melee Attack
  • Mouse Wheel - Camera Zoom In/Out
Credits
  • Lukas Paiva - Game Design and User Interface Design
  • Maurício Ramalho - Music and Sound Effects
  • Rinaldo Klebson - Game Design and Team Management
  • Wendell Paulino - 3D Models and Animations
  • Wesley Ronald - Programming
